pullRequest.body:
Prove five lemmas about fractional ideals (zero_mem, fg_of_isNoetherianRing, den_mem_inv, num_le_mul_inv, bot_lt_mul_inv). 

This is part 1/4 of a proof of `isDedekindDomain_iff_isDedekindDomainDvr`. 
Part 2: #14216
Part 3: #14237
Part 4: #14242

---

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

bors d+

Thanks a lot for your contribution and I look forward to the future PRs! I've made a suggestion to make one of your proofs perhaps easier to maintain.

bors d+

```suggestion
  apply le_trans <| map_mono (show I.num â‰¤ 1 by simp only [Ideal.one_eq_top, le_top, bot_eq_zero])
```
I'm always a bit nervous of `convert` followed by an argument with a little content, because `convert` is so dependent on definitional equality. My suggestion makes this proof a little more robust.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: simple lemmas about fractional ideals
